recipesJson.name: Coffee Creme
recipesJson.author: ooooNaSuGamisoooo
recipesJson.description:
Needs about 10-15 Days for the creams to blend and the coffee to pop!

Coffee INW is KAWA 

http://www.inawerawinkel.com/Flavour-Coffee-10-ml/28/?i=en

reviews.text: Well done!  I finally received he Inw Kawa Coffee, and mixed this.  I was skeptical, because I don't do coffee well, I get that burnt taste every time, but not with this. This is exactly what the name says, a coffee creme, and a really nice one too.
